TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "warped_fence_gate", "quantity": 6, "index": 12}, {"type": "bedrock", "quantity": 29, "index": 13}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 8, "index": 19}, {"type": "lily_of_the_valley", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "crimson_nylium", "quantity": 15, "index": 28}, {"type": "dark_oak_door", "quantity": 45, "index": 30}, {"type": "green_concrete", "quantity": 18, "index": 36}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 18, "index": 39}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "petrified_oak_slab", "quantity": 55, "index": 41}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 32, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft gray_stained_glass, I need to craft gray dye which needs white dye and black dye. The only way to get white dye is to use bone meal, but I don't have any, so I will use lily of the valley instead. I will also need black dye, so I will use the ink sac. To make the gray dye, I will place the lily of the valley and the ink sac together in the crafting table. I will then use the gray dye to craft the gray stained glass. To do this, I need to craft glass. I will start by smelting the red sand in
Ok
act: smelt from slot 19 to slot 11 with quantity 1
